summary: An Ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; providing for assignment to the City of a certain lease (Spring Street Substation) executed pursuant to Ordinance No. 58836 and for the acquisition by the City of the structure located on said substation site, designating the same as one of the additions, betterments and extensions contemplated by Ordinance No. 58871, and appropriating $189,000.00 therefore.
